import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css"; const InventoryView = ({ switchToTimelineView, switchToRiseofRomeView, switchToPunicWarsView, switchToFallofRomeView, switchToStudentView, switchToInventoryView, theEvents }) => { return (


{theEvents.map(event => ( // map reads the whole theEvents array element-by-element
{event.id}. {event.title}

Description - {event.title}

Tag - {product.category}

))}


© Caden Otis and Brandon Rau 2024

); } export default InventoryView;
